nodes.text: The Hutt's Last Laugh was a cantina that was located in the Blinders district of the city Sahl-Evin, on the planet Jenenma. The Zabrak Orth Maag worked in the Last Laugh as a bartender and the majority of the establishment's patrons were Duros. At some point during galactic history, a group of agents visited The Hutt's Last Laugh while they were tracking down a stolen starship that had been taken to the Blinders district. The Gamorrean Tarkil Hroka spilt his drink on one of the agents and he attempted to engage in a fight with the individual.
